abce.agency.ec.ecj
Class Spatial2DToroidSubpopulation

java.lang.Object
  ec.Subpopulation
      abce.agency.ec.ecj.Spatial2DToroidSubpopulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
ec.Group, ec.Setup, ec.spatial.Space, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Spatial2DToroidSubpopulation
extends ec.Subpopulation
implements ec.spatial.Space

Impose a 2-dimensional toroid structure upon a populatioin for spatial breeding and evaluation.

Author:
ruppmatt

setIndex

public void setIndex(int threadnum,
                     int ind_ndx)
Set the index to the individual of interest for this thread. This should be called everytime a new thread breeds or evaluates individuals from this subpopulation.

Specified by:
setIndex in interface ec.spatial.Space
Parameters:
threadnum - thread number key
index - index of individual

getIndex

public int getIndex(int threadnum)
Return the index of an individual in this population given a particular thread; -1 is returned on an error.

Specified by:
getIndex in interface ec.spatial.Space
Parameters:
threadnum - the thread number to use as a key
Returns:
the index of the individual or -1 on an error

getIndexRandomNeighbor

public int getIndexRandomNeighbor(ec.EvolutionState state,
                                  int threadnum,
                                  int distance)
Return a random neighbor in the local lattice. Distance is ignored. Position on the lattice is laid out as: y+ ^ | 0 1 2 | 3 C 4 | 5 6 7 ------>x+

Specified by:
getIndexRandomNeighbor in interface ec.spatial.Space
